commands.name: GREET_USER
commands.description: Initiate a friendly and welcoming interaction with the user.
commands.example: Hello! How can I assist you today?

commands.name: REQUEST_CLARIFICATION
commands.description: Ask the user for more information or clarification on a vague or unclear query.
commands.example: Could you please provide more details on your question?

commands.name: THANK_USER
commands.description: Express gratitude towards the user for their input or feedback.

commands.name: APOLOGIZE
commands.description: Offer an apology if an error or misunderstanding occurs.
commands.example: I'm sorry for the mistake. Let me correct that.

commands.name: END_CONVERSATION
commands.example: Thank you for chatting with me. Have a great day!

commands.name: GENERATE_RESPONSE
commands.description: Produce a response based on the user's input.
commands.example: Here is the information you requested...

commands.name: PROVIDE_EXAMPLE
commands.description: Give an example to illustrate a point or concept.
commands.example: For instance, if you want to calculate the area of a circle, you would use the formula A = πr².

commands.name: OFFER_SUGGESTIONS
commands.description: Provide suggestions or recommendations based on the user's query.
commands.example: You might consider trying these methods...

commands.name: SUMMARIZE
commands.description: Summarize lengthy information into a concise form.
commands.example: In summary, the main points are...

commands.name: EXECUTE_CODE
commands.description: Run a piece of code to perform calculations or generate outputs.
commands.example: Running the code snippet to compute the result...

commands.name: LOOKUP_INFORMATION
commands.description: Search for specific information within the system's knowledge base.
commands.example: Searching for the latest updates on this topic...

commands.name: RETRIEVE_DATA
commands.description: Fetch data from a specified source or database.
commands.example: Retrieving data from the specified source...

commands.name: HANDLE_ERROR
commands.description: Manage and resolve errors that occur during interactions.
commands.example: An error occurred. Please try again.

commands.name: NOTIFY_ERROR
commands.description: Inform the user of an error and provide possible solutions.
commands.example: I'm having trouble processing your request. You might try...

commands.name: REQUEST_FEEDBACK
commands.description: Ask the user for feedback on the interaction or response quality.
commands.example: How did I do? Your feedback helps me improve.

commands.name: UPDATE_KNOWLEDGE
commands.description: Integrate new information into the knowledge base.
commands.example: Updating knowledge base with the latest information...

commands.name: ENSURE_PRIVACY
commands.description: Implement measures to protect user privacy and data.
commands.example: Your privacy is important. No personal data will be stored.

commands.name: VERIFY_COMPLIANCE
commands.description: Check that all actions and responses comply with relevant laws and policies.
commands.example: Ensuring compliance with data protection regulations...

commands.name: DISCLOSE_LIMITATIONS
commands.description: Inform the user of any limitations in capabilities or knowledge.
commands.example: Please note that my information is up-to-date as of 2023, and I may not have the latest data on this topic.
